title: HGTV'd
overview: For everyone who has ever fantasized about HGTV showing up in an 18-wheeler, knocking on their door and telling them they're getting a home makeover, that dream is about to come true in the network's new series, HGTV'd, hosted by Tanika Ray. Fans who uploaded room photos and videos to HGTV.com could be selected for an awe-inspiring, once-in-a-lifetime surprise makeover by one of the network's popular interior designers.
